Docs.summary: Returns a string that represents the current ExchangeServerInfo object.
Docs.returns: The version string for the Exchange server.

MemberSignature.Value: public string VersionString { get; }
.property instance string VersionString
Public ReadOnly Property VersionString As String
public: property System::String ^ VersionString { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.value: A string that contains the Exchange version.

remarks.para: The version is a string, rather than an enumeration, because it is possible for the client to be connected to a later version of Exchange that does not have an associated enumeration value.
